description: Try our easy to follow Ginger & Garlic Prawns With Vegetables recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Ginger & Garlic Prawns With Vegetables Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Stir the prawn mixture and oyster sauce into the pan and cook, stirring, for 3-4 minutes, until the prawn have turned pink and are firm. Serve with rice or noodles.
